rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lobby
rooms.description: Serves as the entry foyer. Designed with a welcoming layout following Vastu principles by aligning entrance to the south direction for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living area combined with kitchen space. Mediterranean style with stone accents and arches. Open layout fosters social interactions for a joint family. Vastu-aligned to east-west axis for balanced energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated with the living area for shared dining experiences. Light-filled space with natural ventilation as per local norms and Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen adjoining the living room. Efficient layout incorporating Mediterranean elements such as tiled backsplash and wooden countertops. Adheres to local building norms for ventilation and safety.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom with privacy and storage solutions. Vastu principles ensure the master bedroom is placed in the south-west or north-east direction depending on family dynamics. Mediterranean design includes arches and warm color palettes.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for joint family usage. Designed with a simple layout ensuring privacy and accessibility while maintaining energy flow per Vastu.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom located near bedrooms. Incorporates local building norms for water drainage and ventilation; Vastu guidelines suggest placement in the north-east corner to balance energy.

rooms.name: Study/Utility Room
rooms.description: Multipurpose room that can serve as a study or storage space. Flexible design allows for adaptation to various needs of the joint family while maintaining Vastu integrity.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Dedicated swimming pool zone integrated into the outdoor space. Mediterranean design with stone paving and surrounding landscape that ensures safety and aligns with local building regulations.

rooms.name: Storage & Utility Area
rooms.description: Space for storage of household items and maintenance utilities. Sized as per budget constraints while ensuring adherence to building norms.
